pullRequest.title: MP Config support for injection of all primitive types
pullRequest.bodyText:
MP Config 1.4 will support injection for Short, Byte and Char. This is preparation work to support these native types in Quarkus. This also requires
updates to MP Config API (not released yet) and SmallRye Config, but it shouldn't impact the current version.

commit.message: MP Config support for injection of all primitive types.

beforeCommit.message: MP Config support for injection of all primitive types.

afterCommit.message: MP Config support for injection of all primitive types.

nodes.bodyText: Since all primitives are handled here now, you could just return type.asPrimitiveType().primitive() instead couldn't you?  Or even just return true perhaps?

+                case SHORT:
+                case BYTE:
+                case CHAR:

nodes.bodyText: I just noticed that OptionalInt/OptionalLong/OptionalDouble are missing from this list.  Might be worth fixing now or later.
